title: INSTRUCTIONS
instructionsOfTheUltimatumGame: Instructions of the Ultimatum Game. Please read them carefully
thisGameIsPlayed: This game is played in rounds by two human players randomly paired.
inEachRound: In each round, one of the them, called BIDDER, makes an offer to the other player, called RESPONDENT, about how to share 100 ECU (Experimental Currency). 100 ECU are equal to 0.10 USD.
theRespondent: The RESPONDENT can either accept or reject the offer of the BIDDER. If he / she accepts, both players split 100 ECU accordingly, else both get 0.
important: Important. If one of the players disconnects for more than 30 seconds the game will be terminated.
inSuchACase: In such a case the player who disconnected will not be paid at all, and the remaining ones will be paid only the show up fee.
ifYouUnderstood: If you understood the instructions correctly press the button to proceed to the game.
